skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Gneisenau. Though I'm not as bellicose as my sister, I'm still confident about my combat capabilities. As some of the best ships the Iron Blood has to offer, we hold the record of being the only battlecruisers to sink a standard aircraft carrier. Your faith in us will not be misplaced.
skins.acquisition: Hello, Commander, I'm Gneisenau. Though my big sister is a bit reckless, we're actually an invincible team. I hope I will be able to sail with her as often as possible!
skins.login: Welcome back. Ready to get back to work? I've prepared everything you need, Commander.
skins.details: My duty is to support my big sister who is always charging too far ahead. Admittedly, it gets a little irritating at times.
skins.secretaryIdle1: You mustn't put off until tomorrow what you can do today. Please take that to heart.
skins.secretaryIdle2: One forgets the cruelty of war after being at peace for too long. The opposite... is true as well, isn't it?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Looking back at it, it's unbelievable that I would mistake that prideful princess as an old-fashioned knight.
skins.secretaryTouch: Isn't it amazing how different people can come to different conclusions about the same topic?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, Anton is locked on, you can't escape now.

skins.JPClientName: サキュバスナイトメア
skins.shipDescription: These Halloween festivities are quite interesting, in a good way. Getting dressed up in these costumes isn't such a bad experience either. Commander, what do you think of my costume?
skins.acquisition: These Halloween festivities are quite interesting, in a good way. Getting dressed up in these costumes isn't such a bad experience either. Commander, what do you think of my costume?
skins.login: At first I was too embarrassed to wear something like this, but I went along with it and after wearing it for a while, I must say I'm starting to see things in a different light...
skins.details: Everyone wants to be a witch for Halloween, so I chose something a little bit different. After seeing your reaction, Commander, I think I chose correctly. Hehehe...
skins.secretaryIdle1: If only my sister were here... Now if we had some sort of pumpkin-smashing gunnery competition, that would have gotten her attention.
skins.secretaryIdle2: This holiday certainly is well suited to us "Ugly Sisters," isn't it?
skins.secretaryIdle3: My tail? Oh it just came with the costume... Still, I'd prefer if you didn't touch it.
skins.secretaryTouch: While I haven't prepared any candy, I do have a "treat" for you to enjoy. Would you like to try? I'm afraid there may be some pain involved... Hehehe...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eek?! Commander, does someone want to be "punished?"
